poaps.name: POAP KINGS Founder
poaps.description: This Founder POAP recognizes the players who were there at the start â€” pushing, donating, and building the traditions that define the clan.

poaps.name: King Thing 10K
poaps.description: King Thing surged from 9,986 to 10,016 trophies, officially breaking the 10K barrier. Running a disciplined 3.8 elixir control deck with composure, tempo control, and precise timing, he earned the +30 that secured his place in five-digit territory.

poaps.name: POAP KINGS Sunday Scrimmage 1
poaps.description: Our first-ever POAP KINGS Sunday Scrimmage. Tournament Standard. Climb the leaderboard and claim the crown. Bragging rights are eternal.

poaps.name: Season 129
poaps.description: Awarded to every member who completes the first full clan season.

poaps.name: Season 130
poaps.description: Awarded to every member who completes the clan season.

poaps.name: Silver League
poaps.description: Awarded when the clan reaches Silver League in Clan Wars, requiring 600 war trophies.

poaps.name: 20 Members
poaps.description: Awarded when the clan reaches 20 members.

poaps.name: 30 Members
poaps.description: Awarded when the clan reaches 30 members.

poaps.name: 40 Members
poaps.description: Awarded when the clan reaches 40 members.

poaps.name: 50 Members
poaps.description: Awarded when the clan reaches a full roster of 50 members.
